mapper.select: SELECT t1.pipel_trace_id, t1.job_trace_id, t1.pipel_id, t3.id as componentId, t3.component_type as componentName, t1.create_time as start_time, t2.create_time as end_time, CASE t2.msg WHEN find_in_set( '运行成功', t2.msg ) THEN '成功' WHEN find_in_set( '运行失败', t2.msg ) THEN '失败' WHEN find_in_set( '跳过', t2.msg ) THEN '跳过' WHEN find_in_set( '禁止', t2.msg ) THEN '禁止' END AS result FROM tb_pipel_job_log t1 LEFT JOIN tb_pipel_job_log t2 ON t1.job_trace_id = t2.job_trace_id LEFT JOIN ${dispatchDbName}.tb_nifi_custom_workflow_detail t3 ON t1.component_id = t3.id WHERE t1.pipel_trace_id = #{pipelTraceId} AND t1.del_flag = 1 AND t2.del_flag = 1 AND t1.type = 4 AND t2.type = 5
